name: Attack
note:
Skill #1 corresponds to the Attack 
command. If the equipped weapon has tag 
'srpgWeaponSkill:X', the skill will be 
used.

<srpgRange:-1>
<specialRange:weapon>
(If srpgRange is "-1", weaponRange in 
 the note of weapons and enemies will be 
 applied.)
(if specialRange is "weapon", 
 specialRange in the note of weapons, 
 actors, classes and enemies will be 
 applied.)

name: Guard
note:
In this sample game, "Guard" is set as 
the pligin default for the the reaction
(the lowest priority).

<userActionIs:forOpponent>
This tag "userActionIs" is used during
reaction. 
The charactor will reaction with this 
skill only if the opponent or friend 
is used skill meets the conditions.
For example, if set to "forOpponent",
this skill will be chosen as the reaction
skill only when the opponent's skill
is set to "scope:opponent".
For more details, please refer to the 
plugin help.

description: surround attack 1
name: Attack
note:
<srpgRange:0>
<srpgAreaRange:1>
- To create an attack targeting the area 
around the user, design it as an AoE 
attack with a range of 0.
- For AI units (auto-controlled actors 
and enemies) to use area attacks 
accurately, 
SPRG_AIcontrol_MZ.js is required.

description: Surrounding Attack 3(checker)
name: Attack
note:
<srpgRange:0>
<srpgAreaRange:3>
<srpgAreaType:checker>
- To create an attack targeting the area 
around the user, design it as an AoE 
attack with a range of 0.
- For AI units (auto-controlled actors 
and enemies) to use area attacks 
accurately, 
SPRG_AIcontrol_MZ.js is required.

description: random attack for 3 targets in AoE
name: Attack

description: The damage will increase in proportion to the attacker's level.
name: Attack

description:
The damage varies in proportion to the attacker's HP.
(damage varies from 50-175% with HP 0-100%)
name: Attack

description:
The damage varies inversely to the attacker's HP.
(damage varies from 225-50% with HP 0-100%)
name: Attack

description:
The damage increases only when the attacker's HP is full.
(250% with HP 100%, otherwise 75%)
name: Attack

description:
The damage varies in proportion to the attacker's TP.
(damage varies from 100-250% with TP 0-100)
name: Attack

description:
The damage varies in proportion to the attacker's move step.
(75% with move step 0, then 25% increase by 1 step)
name: Attack

description:
The damage varies inversely to the attacker's move steps.
(200% with steps 0, 25% decrease by 1 step.)
name: Attack

description:
The damege varies in proportion to the distance from the target.
(75% with distance 1, 25% increase by 1 distance)
name: Attack

description: Oblique + magic attack
name: Attack

description:
Oblique range included. The damege varies in proportion to the distance from the target.
(75% with distance 1, 25% increase by 1 distance)
name: Attack

description:
The damege increases in proportion to the level difference from the target.
(10% increase by 1 level diff)
name: Attack

description: Performs a powerful attack on an enemy.
name: Strong Attack

description: The user can attack prior to the opponent with the attack speed 2000.
name: Preemptive Attack

description:
Ranged attack
Since it has a min range, it can also be used for close battles.
name: Shuriken

description: Attack with poison
name: Poison Attack

description:
Evasion up
The user takes initiative with attack speed 2000 just like Guard.
name: Parry

description:
Prevent status ailments.
The user takes initiative with attack speed 2000 just like Guard.
name: Immunize

description:
Reflects magics.
The user takes initiative with attack speed 2000 just like Guard.
name: Reflect Magic

description:
Responds by healing from a friend's support.
Fights against enemies attack.
name: Bless

description:
Recover HP of all friends within AoE
See note.
name: All Regenerate
note:
<srpgRange:0>
<srpgAllFriendReaction:true>
If you set the scope to "user" and 
use this tag, you van make it a reaction
skill that targets all friends within AoE
when hit by a AoE skill.

"Fire""Range 1""AoE 3 (Front)"

"Ice""Range 2""AoE 2 (horizontal line)"

name: Ninpo "Thuner Tortoise"
note:
<srpgRange:0>
<srpgAreaRange:2>
<srpgAreaType:square>
<doubleAction:false>
- To create an attack targeting the area 
around the user, design it as an AoE 
attack with a range of 0.
- For AI units (auto-controlled actors 
and enemies) to use area attacks 
accurately, 
SPRG_AIcontrol_MZ.js is required.

<srpgAreaType:allOpponent>

higher.

Bow Attack
note:
<srpgRange:-1>
(srpgRangeを -1 にすると、武器・エネミーの
 メモの<weaponRange>が適用されます)

<D-Motion:attack&Wait/>
<D-Animation:shot&lookCourse>
sx -= 10 * mirroring // 始点Ｘ座標
sy += 0 // 始点Ｙ座標
arrival = 4 // 到達フレーム
</D-Animation>
<D-Motion:Wait>
delay = 12
</D-Motion>

name: Gale Slash
note:
<srpgRange:5>
<srpgAreaRange:3>
<AoEAnimation>

===========================================
D-Motion
===========================================
<D-Setting:NoStep>  // Oi֎~

<D-Motion:crash&whole&attack>
frame = 3
</D-Motion>

<D-Animation>
delay = 3
repeat = 3
rotation = (Math.PI * 2) * da.random()
</D-Animation>

<D-Motion:target&roll&jump>
delay = 5
frame = 15
rotation *= 3
arcY = -100
</D-Motion>

<D-Motion:return&roll>
frame = 10
arcY = -200
rotation *= 3
</D-Motion>

name: Ultra Jump
note:
<srpgRange:5>
<srpgAreaRange:3>

===========================================
D-Motion
===========================================
<D-Setting:NoStep>

<D-Animation:damage>
position = 0
delay = 7
nextDelay = 7
</D-Animation>

<D-Motion:crash&jump&every>
position = 0
ey += b.height/8
arcY = -200
motion = victory
frame = 7
nextDelay = 7
playSe = Jump1
wait = auto
</D-Motion>

<D-Motion:return>
arcY = -200
damageAll = false
</D-Motion>

name: Spear Charge
note:
<srpgRange:3>

===========================================
D-Motion
===========================================
// MAP BATTLE ONLY
<D-Motion:near>
condition = !$gameParty.inBattle() && Math.abs(a._character._x - b._character._x) + Math.abs(a._character._y - b._character._y) >= 2
</D-Motion>

<D-Motion:attack/>
<D-Animation>
scaleX = 0.5
</D-Animation>

// MAP BATTLE ONLY
<D-Motion:return>
condition = !$gameParty.inBattle() && Math.abs(a._character._x - b._character._x) + Math.abs(a._character._y - b._character._y) >= 2
</D-Motion>

name: Arrow Rain
note:
<srpgRange:5>
<srpgAreaRange:3>
<AoEAnimation>

===========================================
D-Motion
===========================================
// 弓を引く
<D-Motion:skill>
repeat = 40
interval = 1/2
motionFrame = 1/2/3 // interval/3
</D-Motion>

// 矢連射
<D-Animation:arcRandomAll&lookCourse&wait>
repeat = 40
interval = 1/2
sx -= 10 * mirroring // 弓に位置を合わせる
sy += 10 // 弓に位置を合わせる
ey -= 25
exRandom = 120 // 終点Ｘ座標ランダム幅
eyRandom = 120 // 終点Ｙ座標ランダム幅
arrival = 12 // 到達フレーム
arcY = -500 // 放物線の高さ
</D-Animation>
